worms.model

Class Worm

  • java.lang.Object
    • worms.model.superclasses.Object
      • worms.model.superclasses.Jump
        • worms.model.Worm

  • public class Worm
extends Jump
    A class of worms that can be manipulated, one of the main elements in the game.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Kristof Achten GitHub: https://github.com/Divyak156/OGPProject.git StudentNr: r0462748 - 1ste Bachelor informatica

      Worm(World world, double x, double y, Program prg)
      Slightly compacter constructor to create a worm with a random position.
